attributes.action: tell the London Olympic committee to scrap and change the logo unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: London Olympic committee's new logo has brought the games, the city of London, and the entire nation into disrepute. We ask the PM to use his influence to force a redesign of the logo to produce a logo the nation can be proud to wear on a T-Shirt.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
